articles.description: Discover essential tips and must-have products to maintain healthy skin and hair during the monsoon season. Learn how to combat humidity, prevent skin problems, and embrace the beauty of the rainy season.

articles.content: The onset of the disease is between 40 and 60 years of age (with more severe forms occurring around 20-25 years of age) and tends to develop more frequently in women than in men with a ratio of 7:1.… [+10684 chars]
